scripts.clean: concurrently "cd client && rm -rf build" "cd server && rm -rf build"
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && concurrently "cd client && rm -rf node_modules" "cd server && rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.bootstrap: npm install && concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd  server && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy: npm run bootstrap && npm run clean && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 startOrRestart server/build --name=server
